duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and address homeowner's concerns related to warranty items that need repair.
Schedule and coordinate warranty service repairs with subcontractors in a timely and efficient manner.
Serve as the primary contact for customers' warranty issues and ensure the highest level of customer satisfaction.
Acquire an understanding of the Taylor Morrison Warranty Program and Homeowner Maintenance requirements.
Manage escalated customer calls, documentations, and follow-ups to assure closure on every claim.
Complete customer service requests timely and accurately while providing optimal customer service.
Order, update, and distribute construction-related forms.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate with minimum 3 years of experience in a customer service-related position.
